attributes.action: Give children in England the same standard of education as those in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scottish primary schools are reducing their class sizes, English schools are not, Scottish schools are thinking of giving younger primary school children free school meals, English schools are not,what makes this even more unfair and nonsensicle is...Westminster are paying for it!

Why are children in England not being given the same chances as those in Scotland?
